text:
This is a list of awards and nominations for the film "Poor Things" directed by Gregg Araki. The film stars Emma Stone, Mark Ruffalo, Willem Dafoe, Tony Mackey, Andre Royo, Alia Shawkat, Saul Williams, and Ruthie Ann Miles. It was released in 2023.

The film has been nominated for several major awards including the Academy Awards, Golden Globes, BAFTAs, Critics' Choice Awards, and Independent Spirit Awards. Some of the notable categories it has been nominated in include Best Picture, Best Director, Best Actress, Best Supporting Actor, Best Original Screenplay, Best Cinematography, Best Editing, Best Production Design, Best Costume Design, Best Makeup and Hairstyling, and Best Original Score.

Here are some of the award shows and their respective nominations for "Poor Things":

---

**Academy Awards (Oscars)** *(2024)*

* Best Picture (nominated)
* Best Director - Gregg Araki (nominated)
* Best Actress - Emma Stone (nominated)
* Best Supporting Actor - Mark Ruffalo (nominated)
* Best Supporting Actor - Willem Dafoe (nominated)
* Best Adapted Screenplay - Tony Mackey (nominated)
* Best Cinematography - Robby Reyna (nominated)
* Best Film Editing - Eughes Maestroianni (nominated)
* Best Production Design - Shawna Dyas, James Chinlund (nominated)
* Best Costume Design - Holly Waddington (nominated)
* Best Makeup and Hairstyling - Mark Coulier, Michelle Dockery, Jessica Haney (nominated)
* Best Original Score - Jerome Moross, Jules Styne (nominated)

---

* Best Performance by an Actor in a Supporting Role in any Motion Picture - Willem Dafoe (nominated)
* Best Screenplay – Motion Picture - Tony Mackey (nominated)
* Best Original Score – Motion Picture - Jerome Moross, Jules Styne (nominated)
